metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: Creates an incident whenever DomainTools Domain Discovery new indicators (domains) are ingested in the last 1 hour.
properties.displayName: DomainTools New Domain Discovery Indicators Ingested
properties.query:
DomainToolsThreatIntelDomains_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1h)
| where domaintype == "domaindiscovery"            
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    domain,
    domaintype,
    SourceTable = Type
| extend
    DomainCustomEntity = domain

properties.displayName: DomainTools New Domain Discovery Indicators Ingested

properties.description: Creates an incident whenever DomainTools Domain Discovery new Feeds (domains) are ingested in the last 1 hour.
properties.displayName: DomainTools Newly Added Domains Feeds Ingested
properties.query:
DomainToolsThreatIntelDomains_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1h)
| where domaintype == "nad"            
| project

    domain,
    domaintype,
    SourceTable = Type
| extend
    DomainCustomEntity = domain

properties.displayName: DomainTools Newly Added Domains Feeds Ingested

{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"# DomainTools Threat Intelligence Dashboard
Visualize and correlate DomainTools threat domain data with Microsoft Sentinel telemetry.
---

This workbook provides insights into domains flagged by DomainTools, their ingestion frequency, domain types."},"name":"Header"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"DomainToolsThreatIntelDomains_CL

| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), domaintype
| order by TimeGenerated asc

| summarize TotalDomains = count(), LatestIngestion = max(TimeGenerated)","size":4,"title":"Overview: Ingested Domains Summary","timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"TotalDomains","label":"Total Domains Ingested"},{"columnId":"LatestIngestion","label":"Recent Ingestion Date & Time"}]}},"customWidth":"50","name":"Summary","styleSettings":{"maxWidth":"50%"}}],"fromTemplateId":"sentinel-UserWorkbook","$schema":"https://github.com/Microsoft/Application-Insights-Workbooks/blob/master/schema/workbook.json"}

connectorUiConfig.title: DomainTools Threat Intelligence Domain Feed
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The DomainTools CCF Domain Data Connector retrieves threat-intelligence domain data from multiple DomainTools APIs—including Newly Observed Domains (NOD), Newly Active Domains (NAD), Newly Observed Hostnames (NOH), and Domain Discovery—and ingests it into Microsoft Sentinel for analysis and detection

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and write permissions are required to ingest data into the Log Analytics workspace.

customs.name: Domain Tools API Key is Required
customs.description: To access DomainTools Real Time Feed APIs We need the DomainTools API Key

columns.name: domaintype
columns.description: Type of domain data (nod, noh, nad, domaindiscovery)

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

connectorUiConfig.title: DomainTools Threat Intelligence Domain Feed
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The DomainTools CCF Domain Data Connector retrieves threat-intelligence domain data from multiple DomainTools APIs—including Newly Observed Domains (NOD), Newly Active Domains (NAD), Newly Observed Hostnames (NOH), and Domain Discovery—and ingests it into Microsoft Sentinel for analysis and detection

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution Release Notes

• There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Domaintools Threat Intelligence Feeds solution for Microsoft Sentinel contains CCF-based data connector that ingests domain-related threat intelligence from Domain tools including Newly Observed Domains (NOD), Newly Observed Hostnames (NOH), Newly Active Domains (NAD), and Domain Discovery. The solution also provides an analytic rule that automatically creates incidents when new domains are ingested, enabling security teams to quickly detect and investigate potentially malicious domains. In addition, a workbook is included to visualize domain activity, ingestion trends, and correlations with security telemetry, helping SOC analysts improve threat detection and response.

Data Connectors: 1, Workbooks: 1, Analytic Rules: 4

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
